item.title: Dog loose in no dog zone chasing birds., 31st July
item.description:
The dog in this photo was loose in the no dog zone chasing birds and the owner was out of sight. The dog nearly caught a Greylag goose and the owner appeared and pretended not to know dogs were not allowed in that area. He has been caught doing this before.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Goddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: BMW abandoned, 31st July
item.description:
Another vehicle with no tax and no valid MOT has just been dumped in this parking area. Witnessed someone driving the vehicle in to dump it here the person looked extremely nervous when they saw we were watching. Vehicle could barely move and was stalling no tax since last year driven illegally probably involved in crime. Third vehicle in this area dumped.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 269, Chipperfield Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 211 Chevening Road, London NW6 6DT, 31st July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chevening Road, London

item.title: North side of Pickwick needs more trees, 31st July
item.description:
We have lost several trees on the northerly side of Pickwick Road - outside numbers 10,16 etc - several trees have died / broken / been asphalted over. Could we please have some suitable and attractive trees planted eg flowering cherries to replace those that have disappeared? Thanks Jenny Kay

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickwick Road, Dulwich Village, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shoddy repair to wall, 31st July
item.description:
After a excellent repair to the metal safety barrier between pavement and road outside No 196 Ellenborough Road why was the support wall under barrier not repaired as well? The bricks from the demolished wall have just been left lose on the pavement and are a hazard. I would hope the cars insurance paid for the repair and has this NOT been signed off yet.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ellenborough Road, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Resident gate broken - Waston Close, 31st July
item.description:
The resident gate for parking has broken for around 3 months. The gate is for the Watson Close flat and is between Watson close and Bishops Court on Matthias Road. Car park is constantly overflowing so there are no spaces for actual residents.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Watson Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street cleansing done as it should have been today, 31st July
item.description:

item.title: Weeds growing like trees, 31st July
item.description:
Can’t remember last time Lancaster estate was cleaned and weeded, weeds everywhere, stairs wells are disgustingly dirty , rubbish everywhere in park on stairs on grass , No one seems to clean our estate anymore, it’s months since stairs have been cleaned , can’t remember when weeds were cleared like I said there growing into trees !!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lancaster Street, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet
